description: Bowhall Red Maple is an amazing plant species for many reasons. Its distinctive feature is its vibrant red foliage. The tree produces dark green leaves in the summer that take on a bright red hue during the fall months. It is a hardy tree, able to tolerate a range of soil types, from acidic to alkaline. Its versatility means it can be planted in both rural and urban environments. It can reach heights of up to 30 feet, and its deep root system makes it resistant to storms and other harsh weather conditions. Its beautiful, fall foliage makes it an excellent choice for gardens, landscaping, and parks.
